what: An R package to calculate health indicators
title: An R package to calculate health indicators
text: R package calculate health indicators using raw data PCDaS ElasticSearch cluster sources. BILIS stands Banco de Indicadores Laboratorio de Informacao de Saude.

title: Population denominators — denominator_pop
text: function retrieves populatin denominators.

title: Population denominators — denominator_pop
code: denominator_pop(agg, sex = "all", age_group_vec = "totals")

title: Population denominators — denominator_pop
text: agg character. Spatial aggregation level. uf_res UF residence. uf_ocor UF occurrence. regsaude_res regiao de saude residence. regsaude_ocor regiao de saúde occurence. mun_res municipality residence. mun_ocor municipality ocurrence. sex character. Defaults . age_group_vec character. Defaults age groups vector specified age groups.

title: Expand indicator results with arguments with parallel processing — expand_indi
code: expand_indi(agg, agg_time, anos, indi_fun, save_args = TRUE)

title: Expand indicator results with arguments with parallel processing — expand_indi
text: agg character vector. Spatial aggregation levell. uf_res UF residence. uf_ocor UF occurrence. regsaude_res regiao de saude residence. regsaude_ocor regiao de saúde occurence. mun_res municipality residence. mun_ocor municipality ocurrence. agg_time character vector. Time aggregation levels. year yearly data. month monthly data. week weekly data. Defaults year. anos numeric vector. Years. indi_fun character. Function name. save_args logical. Save agg agg_time arguments results table.

title: Expand indicator results to SQLite — expand_indi_sqlite
text: agg character vector. Spatial aggregation level. uf_res UF residence. uf_ocor UF occurrence. regsaude_res regiao de saude residence. regsaude_ocor regiao de saúde occurence. mun_res municipality residence. mun_ocor municipality ocurrence. agg_time character vector. Time aggregation levels. year yearly data. month monthly data. week weekly data. Defaults year. anos numeric vector. Years db character. SQLite file address name. indi character function names vector. Defaults indi_ functions. table_name character. Indicators table name.
